Package com.example.fairdraw.ServiceUtility

Class FirebaseImageStorageService

java.lang.Object
com.example.fairdraw.ServiceUtility.FirebaseImageStorageService
public class FirebaseImageStorageService extends Object
A service for interacting with Firebase Cloud Storage to manage entrant profile images and event posters. This class provides methods to upload, download, delete, and check for the existence of images.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    FirebaseImageStorageService.EventPosterInfo
    Simple DTO for mapping an event ID to its poster download Uri.

  • Method Details

    • uploadEntrantProfile

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Uri> uploadEntrantProfile(@NonNull String entrantId, @NonNull Bitmap bitmap, int jpegQuality, int maxBytes)
      Uploads an entrant's profile picture from a Bitmap. The bitmap is compressed to a JPEG with the specified quality and byte limit.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The ID of the entrant.
      bitmap - The profile image as a Bitmap.
      jpegQuality - The initial JPEG compression quality (1-100).
      maxBytes - The maximum allowed size of the compressed image in bytes.
      Returns:
      A Task containing the download URL of the uploaded image.

    • uploadEntrantProfile

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Uri> uploadEntrantProfile(@NonNull String entrantId, @NonNull Uri fileUri)
      Uploads an entrant's profile picture from a file URI.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The ID of the entrant.
      fileUri - The URI of the image file.
      Returns:
      A Task containing the download URL of the uploaded image.

      Returns:

      maxDownloadBytes - The maximum number of bytes to download.

    • uploadEventPoster

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Uri> uploadEventPoster(@NonNull String eventId, @NonNull Bitmap bitmap, int jpegQuality, int maxBytes)
      Uploads an event poster from a Bitmap. The bitmap is compressed to a JPEG with the specified quality and byte limit.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      bitmap - The poster image as a Bitmap.
      jpegQuality - The initial JPEG compression quality (1-100).
      maxBytes - The maximum allowed size of the compressed image in bytes.
      Returns:
      A Task containing the download URL of the uploaded image.

      fileUri - The URI of the image file.
      Returns:

      Parameters:

    • listAllEventPosters

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<FirebaseImageStorageService.EventPosterInfo>> listAllEventPosters()
      Lists all event posters currently stored under the EVENTS_DIR.

      This is primarily intended for admin use: it scans each child folder under /events (where each folder name is an eventId), attempts to resolve poster.jpg, and for every event where a poster exists, returns an FirebaseImageStorageService.EventPosterInfo containing the eventId and its download Uri.

      Returns:
      A Task that resolves to a list of EventPosterInfo objects. Only events that actually have a poster are included.

    • uploadEventQr

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Uri> uploadEventQr(@NonNull String eventId, @NonNull Bitmap bitmap, int jpegQuality, int maxBytes)
      Uploads an event QR image from a Bitmap. Prefers PNG encoding; falls back to JPEG if PNG exceeds maxBytes.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      bitmap - The QR image as a Bitmap.
      jpegQuality - The initial JPEG compression quality (used only if PNG is too large).
      maxBytes - The maximum allowed size of the compressed image in bytes.
      Returns:
      A Task containing the download URL of the uploaded QR image.

    • uploadEventQr

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Uri> uploadEventQr(@NonNull String eventId, @NonNull Uri fileUri)
      Uploads an event QR image from a file Uri.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      fileUri - The URI of the QR image file.
      Returns:
      A Task containing the download URL of the uploaded QR image.

      Returns:
